forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain. The rain may be heavy at times early. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Rain, heavy at times early. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...thunderstorms developing late. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
